articles.title: 'We are outraged': US plane diverted after passenger assaults flight attendant - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: The passenger will be banned from American Airlines flights, the airline said, but “we will not be satisfied until he has been prosecuted to the full extent of the law".
articles.content:
An American Airlines flight from New York to California was diverted to Denver after a passenger assaulted a flight attendant, US authorities have said.

articles.title: China furious as Taiwan prez says US training its troops - Hindustan Times
articles.description: China has said it “firmly” opposes military links between Taiwan and the US after it emerged that American troops were training soldiers on the self-governing island, which Beijing says is a breakaway region. | World News
